text: You could feel, you could smell, you could sense the next step, you could smell the play.
You could smell if the other team was, you know, slowing down.
Do you think we can get back to that?
Not for now. We can, we have to try.
I mean, I will certainly try because I'm a big believer, that football is changing and you need to adapt to every situation
and you need to adapt to what's happening now.
I mean, you cannot get away from this and you cannot underestimate the...
